dct_title_s: Official map of the County of Santa Clara, California
dct_description_sm: compiled from official surveys and records and the tax-list of 1902-3 [by] J.G. McMillan, County Surveyor.
Shows roads, railroads, land ownership, ranchos, township and section lines, school districts.
"Approved and declared the official map of Santa Clara County by order of the Board of Supervisors, July 7th, 1903."

Includes ill., "Topographical sheet accompanying county map, showing topography from summit of Coast Range to Pacific Ocean," "Index to Spanish grants and early private land claims," street index, list of post offices and list of subdivisions.
